Reviews.Title: Solid Phone for the Price
Reviews.Author: Mark Follo
Reviews.Content: I received this phone as a quick fix for an old broken phone. However, I think this will last me longer than I thought. Although the camera is mediocre and the touch is not as responsive as I would like it to be, this  phone cannot be beat for the price! Also, it comes with a screen protector and a case! This phone has a solid construction and is probably one of the best deals for an android phone out there.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Alfredo
Reviews.Content: is a phone with good finishes, with quality that characterizes BLU products, price / exceptional quality, is a fast phone with updates on a website, I recommend it 100%.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: RYAN001
Reviews.Content: ***UPDATE 26 May 2014***  So after a few more weeks of use I am updating this review.  My wife uses this phone and she seems to be "okay" with it.  As a preface, she went from an iPhone to this phone.  We would have stayed with the iPhone but it was a Verizon CDMA phone so you're screwed if you want to make it a pay as you go phone.  Anyway, two comments from her - 1) scrolling on certain apps like Pinterest seems to be difficult and frustrating as the touch screen wants to activate links as you're scrolling; and 2) the camera is okay but nothing to get too excited about.  Other than those two comments the only other recommendation is use a Google browser when surfing the internet from the network.  For some reason the Android browser doesn't work.  Also, as mentioned below we went with StraightTalk (owned and operated by Tracfone) and their customer service was pretty good in trying to help resolve the internet issue, however we found the solution on our own.  Tracfone just sent us a new sim...good luck out there and still contend this is a great phone for the price point.***********We divorced ourselves of Verizon and contracts about six months ago.  Looking for a reasonably priced phone that we could register with a "pay as you go" service.  Also I have family members who are rough on phones so I wanted a phone that if it broke it wouldn't be $500 or more to replace it.  With all that said I opted to go this route after lots of research and what was best for our situation.Positives --1.  Phone came earlier than expected which is always nice.2.  Overall first impressions are what I expected at the price point.3.  The phone registered onto StraightTalk with no issue.  I opted for the T-Mobile compatible sim which worked flawlessly.Neutrals --1. Functionality of the phone...so far no complaints as it operates like most Android systems.2. Resolution of screen is crisp.  I am sure some people could tell the difference between other systems but this one seems compatible with the Samsung I had a few years ago.  I will update later as the phone vets more use.Negatives --1.  Note: I don't use a ton of apps but the of board memoir is small!  Yes, it has a SD slot to expand memory but this only helps for music, pictures, and videos and won't help if you're a big gamer. So consider your memory needs before purchasing.  (If you use apps like FB, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, and so on then there will be plenty of memory for you.)2.  Back panel is thin plastic.  If you think Samsung series of phones are thin this one is about on par maybe a little lighter!  I highly recommend the purchase of a phone cover.  Can only find them on Ebay and they're not like an Otterbox Defender so just know you will be running some risk with survivability if someone drops this phone on concrete or asphalt.Will update in a few weeks once it gets more usage.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: notboca
Reviews.Content: Got the phone one week ago. All features are as advertised and more. Great value for the money. Love it!

Reviews.Title: this phone is nice product
Reviews.Author: jose julian delgado rangel
Reviews.Content: It is a relatively quick and good mobile, it meets my expectations. good image and good camera. i like it

Reviews.Title: BLU ADVANCE 4.5 UNLOCKED DUAL SIMS PHONE
Reviews.Author: adesola awolola
Reviews.Content: THE PRODUCT IS VERY GOOD. THE CAMERA IS VERY GOOD AND UP TO THE STANDARD I WAS LOOKING FOR. I RECOMMENDED IT FRIENDS.

Reviews.Title: A phone that inspires many feelings
Reviews.Author: Jesus R Zurita M
Reviews.Content: This phone meets all expectations, it is a low price phone has the same features of a high end. It has nothing to envy to another, especially patch for the Venezuelan market, it works correctly.

Reviews.Title: BLU Advance 4.5
Reviews.Author: Glendon Swift
Reviews.Content: This phone is small enough and big enough.I am yet to learn all the features but I like it so far. It is a neat phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: LJW
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to use as a mini tablet for medical reference because I work at a hospital. I didn't want to take my actual phone in and get it germy and dirty so I decided to try this phone out. I am using it without any SIM card (the phone holds 2) and I am solely using wifi. The phone is great for this and holds a lot of apps and documents that I use often. My only complaint is that it can overheat from time to time and it needs to cool down before it will work again. This would be a great phone for younger kids/teens as a first smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is cheap and have a lot of fun. Screen is big, main camera is good! The sual sim is very practice. I love it

Reviews.Title: dead pixel
Reviews.Author: Greg 414
Reviews.Content: This phone shouldn't be for regular sale. It's not OK to sell it like that. I wouldn't order it if I would know about it.

Reviews.Title: Very bad performance
Reviews.Author: fvandm
Reviews.Content: The phone looks nice but after using it for almost two months it really let me down, is very very slow and frequently gets freeze with very simple and light apps like whatsapp, google maps, email, etc. it really disappoint me and it was a bad purchase as it doesn't really work because of its lack of capacity. I would not recommend buying this, don't waste your money and buy something with much more CPU power and ram capacity.

Reviews.Title: blu advance 4.5
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: my son is loving this phone i have the same one bought it in the store pissed because i paid less for it online and his phone works fine i lost my receipt for my phone so i couldnt return it other then that im happy with the one i bought online will recommend

Reviews.Title: Great phone good price- camera is meh
Reviews.Author: Diginick
Reviews.Content: This is a great smart phone dont waste so much money on a Samsung! I read that Blu makes these slick phones for cheaper because they don't have the huge overhead costs of major retailers like Samsung and Apple- seems true.It does everything you expect a smartphone to do and it's stylish/sleek/and quick.It's cool they give you a free case/screen covers with it too.However I just couldn't live with the 5mp camera, I was used to 8mp's and I definitely noticed the difference in quality. Note you need to setup the APN to get your MMS (picture messages on text) to work. It took me awhile to realize that. If you don't care too much about the camera, say you just wanna take profile pics (close range) and what not than this is fine.I exchanged it for another Blu phone, for $60 more the camera and everything is way better (if you dont mind the usb on top)-BLU Life Play Unlocked Dual Sim Phone with Quad-Core 1.2GHz Processor, Android 4.2 JB, 4.7-inch IPS HD Display, 4G HSPA+ up to 42Mbps and 8MP Camera (

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: B. Nicol
Reviews.Content: This is my first smartphone - I do not want to pay big dollars for cellphone service, so I went to T-Mobile with this phone, simple setup no need to open up the manual on this thing. The guy at T-Mobile asked where I got the phone and for what - he could not believe that I had a phone that looked liked the Samsung S5 for 1/6 the price. The camera quality is OK - if you want better, buy one of those fancy cameras called a DSLR. The screen resolution is not super HD - but it is really good, and any regular person would not be able to tell the difference. I'm a professional photographer and I am happy with the resolution.I was so happy with my cellphone that within 2 weeks I purchased 3 more - same one for my kids and the Studio 5 II for my wife. They love them. I got 4 phones for less then a Samsung S5 and less then any iPhone and much bigger screen then any of the iPhones.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: N. Sumanasekera "sane"
Reviews.Content: This is great phone for a reasonable price. Worked great with my new sim card. Not too big or small. I was able to download few apps without trouble, and not fancy but like the phone cover come with it

Reviews.Title: i love phone *w*
Reviews.Author: Mileni S.
Reviews.Content: is perfect for my basic day i love it this phone soo good price very well phone for blu i love it

Reviews.Title: Love my phobe
Reviews.Author: Tammyshia Pinard
Reviews.Content: Working perfectly and I just love it!!!....... Dont really have no complaints what so ever. You should totally tey this phone out!

Reviews.Title: WiFi issue
Reviews.Author: Cotina
Reviews.Content: Great phone... I'm having problems connecting to the portable WiFi / tethering function my laptop is not connecting with the WiFi signal... Any suggestions... But other than that its a great phone

Reviews.Title: BLU Advance 4.5 unlocked dual sim
Reviews.Author: Gil N Galvez
Reviews.Content: A smartphone with a lot of features at a low price point $99. The camera is mediocre but what do you expect at this price.  This phone is a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: David Smith
Reviews.Content: I wish the phones internal memory was more But it will do!8 gig would be better!I will make do!Oh well!

Reviews.Title: So good.
Reviews.Author: Angel Acosta
Reviews.Content: I give it 5 stars because it is really more than expected, the screen is a decent size if we talk of a touchscreen phone. Lift H+ normally, and if we remember the cost then we know it is a good investment. Recommended! :)

Reviews.Title: STICK TO SAMSUNG PRODUCTS
Reviews.Author: victoria williams
Reviews.Content: THE TOUCH SENSOR RESPONSE ON THIS PHONE IS SLOOOWWW. ITS NOT LIKE THE BLU STUDIO 5.3 II THAT I HAD BEFORE. PHONE IS THICKER THAN THE CURRENT MODEL PHONES OUT THERE. WILL BE PURCHASING SOMETHING DIFFERENT SOON.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Sean Janson
Reviews.Content: I usually write reviews only when unhappy, but this time, I decided to change my habits. What a great deal. I already have NEXUS 4 and NEXUS 5 in the family and decided to buy this one as a throwaway / may-get-stolen phone for my EU trip. Well, it worked as well as my other Google phones, it costs half and it beats NEXUS by having 2 SIMs and microSD, Great job, BLU.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Dual SIM Phone, Dual Core 1.0 GHz Processor
Android 4.2 Jelly Bean, 4G 850/1900 HSPA+ 21 Mbps
4.5" High Resolution FWVGA Display
3.5 mm Audio Jack, FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player Micro SD Slot up to 32GB
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Advance 4.5 Unlocked Dual SIM Phone (Black)
